sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnadbkmanage ( ADBK_ID /* */ , ADBK_NM /* */ , OTHBC_SCOPE /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , WRTER_ID /* */ , TRGET_ORGNZT_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #adbkId# /* */ , #adbkNm# /* */ , #othbcScope# /* */ , #useAt# /* */ , #wrterId# /* */ , #trgetOrgnztId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnadbkmanage SET ADBK_ID=#adbkId# /* */ , ADBK_NM=#adbkNm# /* */ , OTHBC_SCOPE=#othbcScope# /* */ , USE_AT=#useAt# /* */ , WRTER_ID=#wrterId# /* */ , TRGET_ORGNZT_ID=#trgetOrgnztId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ WHERE ADBK_ID=#adbkId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT ADBK_ID /* */ , ADBK_NM /* */ , OTHBC_SCOPE /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , WRTER_ID /* */ , TRGET_ORGNZT_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtnadbkmanage WHERE ADBK_ID=#adbkId# /* */

SELECT ADBK_ID /* */ , ADBK_NM /* */ , OTHBC_SCOPE /* */ , USE_AT /* */ , WRTER_ID /* */ , TRGET_ORGNZT_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtnadbkmanage WHERE 1=1
ADBK_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
ADBK_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY ADBK_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnadbkmanage WHERE 1=1
ADBK_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
ADBK_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
